mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUN_PROJECT VALUES(SEQ_PROJECT.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{fundtype}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{tag}, #{bank}, ${goalfund}, TO_DATE(#{sdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(#{edate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(#{pdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(#{shipdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), SYSDATE, '1')
